pullrequest.title: Bump ign sensors dependencies to use gz11 dependencies

content.raw: The last try fails by the lack of c\+\+17 support [https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition\_sensors-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/4/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/4/console) . This makes easier to merge my patches \(checkout `multi_gz11` branch\) first that will make many things automatically for the gz11 branches. You can  decline this PR by now and I’ll include your changes in the PR for gz11
content.html: The last try fails by the lack of c++17 support https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/4/console . This makes easier to merge my patches (checkout multi_gz11 branch) first that will make many things automatically for the gz11 branches. You can decline this PR by now and I’ll include your changes in the PR for gz11
